meaning_str.bing:
v. 实施；执行；表现；引导
n. 举止；管理方法；经营方式；实施办法
网络. 行为；处理；传导

举止；管理方法；经营方式；实施办法

行为；（人在某地、某种情况下的）举止；品行；管理；指挥；引导；传导热；传导电
指挥（乐队、合唱团）；组织；实施；执行；进行；引导；带领；传导；表现；举止；管理；操作；导引

1.en: As if they had not broken rules of conduct, as if they had not sinned and shamed themselves and their families.
1.cn: 好像他们还没有打破行为的规则，好像他们还没有得罪和羞辱其家庭。

2.en: No matter how much customer care training we conduct, some customers will dislike our service.
2.cn: 不管有多少客户关心我们所进行的培训活动，总有一些人会不喜欢我们的服务的。

3.en: conduct business with you. What I care about is the quality of the goods. Please have a look at these samples.
3.cn: 们做成交易。我关心的是货物的质量。请给我看一下那些样品。

0.en: I don't have the right words for what happened that day. But he was a hero, no question. Captain Conway's conduct was heroic. A hero.
0.cn: 我无法用合适的语言形容那天发生的事。但毋庸置疑他是位英雄。康威上尉的行为是英勇的。一位英雄。

1.en: And we will not have this conversation every time you feel uncomfortable with what I ask you to do, or how I choose to conduct myself. That's our dynamic.
1.cn: 我们不能每次你对我的要求有所不情愿，或不满我的行为，就要这样争辩一番。这就是我们的关系。

2.en: Entitlements are bankrupting us. Now, I had Remy conduct a little poll.
2.cn: 福利项目在让国家破产，我让雷米进行了一项民调。

3.en: Wait! I know. I'm going to conduct an interview with myself and post it online.
3.cn: 我知道啦，做个自访，然后放到网上去。

4.en: I wasn't there to conduct. Any fucking moron can wave his arms and keep people in tempo.
4.cn: 我不是去指挥的，弱智也会摇摇胳膊控制节奏。

5.en: Listen, I really appreciate your coming all the way to the palace to conduct this interview.
5.cn: 十分感激你大老远来我家做这个采访。

6.en: Would you characterize his conduct as extreme, Andrew? Did he ever intentionally inflict emotional distress?
6.cn: 你觉得他的教学方式是否太过极端？他是否有在精神上蓄意折磨你？

7.en: That's an odd mix of people. Well, for our first time hosting, I thought it would be wise to conduct a trial run.
7.cn: 客人的组合好奇怪啊。我们第一次邀请客人来家里，我认为先做个试验是明智之举。

8.en: Cadet Kirk, evidence has been submitted to this council, suggesting that you violated the ethical code of conduct pursuing to regulation 17.43 of the Starfleet code.
8.cn: 寇克同学，委员会收到证据，表明你违反了星际舰队法律第17章第43条规则里面的规范。

9.en: Our role is simple. Through our ecosystem, we help merchants and customers find each other and conduct business on their terms and in ways that best serve their unique needs.
9.cn: 其实，我们的目标非常简单，通过阿里巴巴搭建的生态系统，能够帮助商家和客户找到彼此，并且按照他们独特的需求方式开展业务。

10.en: Yeah, well, I still got a week left to go in the program, and according to the rules, if I want to get the money I'm not allowed to conduct any personal experiments, if you know what I mean.
10.cn: 此计划我只剩一星期，根据规定，如果我想拿到钱，我就不能做“个人”实验，如果你们懂我意思的话。
